SAINT.Name: Martyrs Timothy and Maura of Antinoe in Egypt (+ c.286)
Venerable Theodosius the Abbot of the Kiev Far Caves (+1074)
St. Peter the Wonderworker and Bishop of Argolis (10th C)
Venerables Juliana (1393) and Eupraxia (1394) of Moscow
Icons of the Mother of God: The Dormition of the Kiev Caves, transferred from Constantinople (1073), of Pechersk (with Sts. Anthony and Theodosius) (1085), and of Sven (1288)
